revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix
revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Airlink101 AR680W.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = 300N Wireless Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://www.airlink101.com/products/ar680w.php |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = Airlink101_AR680W |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Airlink101 |model = AR680W |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = N300 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = RRK-AR680W,RRK2007050009 |icid = 4833A-AR680W |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = 5V Technologies;5VT1310;RT1310A, GT8026.1, 0717B, 5VT1310; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM926EJ-S |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 300 <!-- 300 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Spansion;S29AL032D90TFI04; |flash1size = 4 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 16 |ram1chip = SK hynix;HY57V641620ETP-6; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Realtek;RTL8306S;RTL8306S, 6A434QA, G736B TAIWAN; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:18:02, 00:1D:6A |oui = 00:18:02, 00:1D:6A
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;1.1.3;; |stockos = Linux;2.6.17.6;;
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 3 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = 9 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, internal,, 4-pin header,,, unpopulated,, JP1,, (38400 8N1),,, 3.3V TTL |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = default |defaultssid_regex = ^default$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Alpha Networks |manuf_model = WRG-N15 |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = Discontinued |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 06/25/2007 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B0017GLCQM |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Ralink;RT2860;RT2860RT, GT43390D0, 0716ST; |rad1chip2 = Ralink;RT2820L; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== The CPU in the FCC photos appears to be the ''[[5V Technologies]]'' 5VT1310.. :of which the ''[[Ralink]]'' RT1310A is a rebranded version of the chip.
*Per [http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=82023 this DD-WRT forums thread], the [[Conceptronic C300BRS4 v1]] :is a clone ( / shares the same parent OEM model) of this device.
===PSU(s)=== The power adapter included with the device is a :'''Jentec Technology Co., Ltd.''' AF1805-A (5V, 3A). {{hasPowerSupply |brand = JENTEC |model = AF1805-A |countrymanuf = China |input_v=100-120 |input_a= |input_c=AC |input_hz=50-60 |input_conn=NEMA 1-15P |output_v=5 |output_a=3 |output_c=DC |output_conn=barrel |output_OD=5.5 |output_ID=2.1 |output_LEN=9.5 |style=small, straight }}
==Links of Interest== ===Wikis=== *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/doku.php?id=oldwiki:openwrtdocs:hardware:airlink101:ar680w ''Airlink101 AR680W'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] :U-Boot 1.1.3 bootloader, Linux 2.6.17.6
